title: Composer's Solution Vol.4: Art House Blues Music
description: 13 Cool  & Atmospheric Author's Blues Soundtracks by Aquartos (Full preview avaliable)
longDescription:
[Composer's Solution Vol.4: Art House Blues Music] Pack contains:

13 unique and interesting Composer's OST by Aquartos, WAVE format, 46 min of music:


Full preview with TimeCodes: https://youtu.be/87YmbFNJH7k


  1. The Misty Wanderer
  2. The Road To Nowhere
  3. Sleeping Cowboy
  4. The Great Tail's Blues
  5. Vagabond's Stories
  6. Trains
  7. Train to the Moon
  8. When The Rain Danced On My Window
  9. Rainy City Blues
  10. The Rainy Whale's Story
  11. Venedict's Blues
  12. Ex Bluesman
  13. Strider


Contact: AquartosProduction@gmail.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Made with soul, without cliche and without copying other authors, from concept to mastering
  • Unique Author's Sound by Aquartos


Number of Audio Wavs: 13

Number of Audio Cues: 13

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 46

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Thanks for your attention!
